channel.title: ConTechNews
channel.description: Learn about the latest in Construction Technology!

item.title: The Up and Under: Crafty Finishing Around the Rim
item.description: Explore the up and under move, its execution, and how it can be used to finish around taller defenders in a basketball game.
item.author: contact@quantumcybersolutions.com (ConTechNews)

item.title: Establishing Deep Post Position: Winning the Battle for Space
item.description: Explore the essential strategies and techniques for gaining and maintaining deep post position in basketball. This article offers insights for both players and coaches to dominate the paint.
item.author: contact@quantumcybersolutions.com (ConTechNews)

item.title: Passing from the Post: Creating Opportunities
item.description: Explore the art of passing from the post, the nuances of recognizing double teams, and the skills to find open teammates to create scoring opportunities.
item.author: contact@quantumcybersolutions.com (ConTechNews)
